de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.math.statistics.distribution.estimator

Class AbstractMADEstimator<D extends Distribution>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.math.statistics.distribution.estimator.AbstractMADEstimator<D>
  • Type Parameters:
    D - Distribution to generate.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    DistributionEstimator<D>, MADDistributionEstimator<D>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CauchyMADEstimator, ExponentialMADEstimator, ExponentialMedianEstimator, GammaMADEstimator, GumbelMADEstimator, LaplaceMADEstimator, LogisticMADEstimator, LogLogisticMADEstimator, NormalMADEstimator, RayleighMADEstimator, UniformMADEstimator

    public abstract class AbstractMADEstimator<D extends Distribution>
extends Object
implements MADDistributionEstimator<D>
    Abstract base class for estimators based on the median and MAD.
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
